name: 星尘战区 Stardust Theater
description:
☆ Introduction
The protagonist encounters a mysterious spaceship during a reconnaissance mission, and the whereabouts of his teammates are unknown after the chaos. You will set sail with the protagonist to explore the truth of the incident, and what awaits you will be a dangerous journey...

☆ Keyboard operation
WSAD: Mobile
Space: Shoot, confirm
M: Special weapons
Esc: Pause the game

☆ Handle operation (Xbox)
Cross key/joystick: move
A: Shoot; confirm
RB | RT: Special weapons
BACK: Pause the game

★ Please note that！
The game only supports 64-bit operating system.
The 32-bit system will not work.
